config.neo4j.topic.cypher.outbox.project:
WITH $event AS event
FOREACH (_ IN CASE event.eventType WHEN 'deleted' THEN [1] ELSE [] END |
  MATCH (p:Project {biz_id: event.aggregateId})
  DETACH DELETE p
)
FOREACH (_ IN CASE event.eventType WHEN 'deleted' THEN [] ELSE [1] END |
  MERGE (p:Project {biz_id: event.aggregateId})
  ON CREATE SET p.createdAt = datetime(event.occurredAt)
  SET p += event.payload.after, p.version = event.version, p.updatedAt = datetime(event.occurredAt)
)
config.errors.deadletterqueue.topic.name: dlq.neo4j
